issue.message:
Lint found an issue registry (`timber.lint.TimberIssueRegistry`) which is older than the current API level; these checks may not work correctly.
Recompile the checks against the latest version. Custom check API version is 1 (3.1+), current lint API level is 2 (3.2+)

The image `image_laptop_centered.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/image_laptop_centered.png: 142x82 dp (213x123 px), drawable-xhdpi/image_laptop_centered.png: 213x123 dp (426x246 px), drawable-xxhdpi/image_laptop_centered.png: 213x123 dp (639x369 px)

The image `image_laptop_cutoff.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/image_laptop_cutoff.png: 84x82 dp (126x123 px), drawable-xhdpi/image_laptop_cutoff.png: 126x123 dp (252x246 px), drawable-xxhdpi/image_laptop_cutoff.png: 126x123 dp (378x369 px)
Missing density variation folders in `src/main/res`: drawable-mdpi
